cards.title: Aurora Watch
cards.summary: G4 possible. Best bets after local midnight; dark skies help.

cards.title: How to Capture Auroras
cards.summary: Wide lens; ISO 1600–3200; 4–6s exposure; manual focus on bright star; shoot RAW.
